divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside with the computer; took a break to smoke a cigarette. saw a passerby walking on the road... said hi.... walked back into my driveway and leaned up against my truck and looked up. Saw one passing over. Just a white light... no flashing... went inside to get my wife after I lost it behind a tree... figuring she would be able to see it once it passed over the tree blocking my view from that particular area... I went out before her to re-spot it.. and it was gone...
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Baton Rouge
There was one other sighting in Baton Rouge on or around October 10th 2007
